author: tripod
msg: OAK-482 Group members stored in a rep:members tree
- rep:memberRefencesList must be OPV=Copy, otherwise the member-versioning behavior differs

author: stefan2
msg: Follow-up to r1544745: fix compatibility code for pre-1.3 APR.

author: bodewig
msg: build file for extensions - the MarshalByRef extension currently doesn't build, will see to that later

author: stefan2
msg: Introduce a data structure that combines all state of an svnserve
connection, including repository, pools, socket and server baton.
Use this new struct to eliminate mode-specific code and structures -
This will enable us to "suspend" connections in later commits,
i.e. handling many connections using a limit number of threads
(connection_t): new type consolidating all connection-related info
(accept_connection): new function with most code taken from
(serve_thread): thread param is now a connection_t
(main): note how the pool cleanup simplifies sub_main

author: bodewig
msg: LOG4NET-408 InterprocessLock forgot there was a Mutex to close after closing the file for the first time, causing problems with rolling files.  Patch by  Igor Candido via github PR.  closes #6
